name: Squeeballs Party
description:
Nintendo.com Description (from Ad Blurbs)

Are you ready to mangle your cuddly Squeeball?!



Squeeballs are small creatures manufactured on a secret island somewhere in the Pacific Ocean. Before they can be sold to children as toys around the world, Squeeballs must be fully tested…to the point of destruction. That's where the player comes in. They blow up, slice, smack, punch, bowl, shoot and skim the Squeeballs through mini-game challenges!
